Blog.post: urlLink I love this picture!!! I think about it now and this had to be one of the funnest nights in Quito, and maybe all of Ecuador. hehehe. Eva, Ashley, me, Kavita, Fernando, Felipe, Negro, Jose in the front, and Leo! urlLink
urlLink A typical hillside in Ecuador, with all of its houses urlLink

urlLink Hola everyone!!!! this is my Ecuador page with nearly all of my pictures......theres a lot, but they are pretty cute!!!! So yeah i hope you all enjoy it......I had such a great time and i love to share it all with everyone! Love ya! urlLink
urlLink Me and Kate....we were standing on those wretched little pillars that they have in Quito, and they were supposed to be in the pic, but Patrick kinda cut them out....hehehehe urlLink
urlLink In the truck going to Papayata. urlLink
urlLink Vicky with her extremely cute niece. urlLink
urlLink Me and Eva in the train at Nariz del diablo!! urlLink
urlLink Dylano and Rambo in the back of the truck on the way to Papayata.......we were having the cuddle fest 2004.......ahhh memories urlLink
urlLink Dylano, Dusty, and Vicky in the best falafal place called Aladin. Que Rico! urlLink
urlLink On our way to Papayata the hotsprings, our very last night in Quito urlLink
urlLink Patrick and Rachel in the chiva!!!! urlLink
urlLink Kate in front of the Chiva!!!! urlLink
urlLink Sam, vince, and Kavita chillin in the church courtyard taking a break from the chiva urlLink
urlLink Ashley and Fernando.......Que Lindo!!! (Just imagine Fernando saying it.) urlLink
urlLink The last day i saw Luis........he was so cute urlLink
urlLink Luis playing the guitar for me.....he was pretty good urlLink
urlLink Luis........what else can i say.....Luis urlLink
urlLink Most of my family urlLink
urlLink This is the whole family. Vickys dad was my uncle, and Emily, from the other groups, parents were related to my dad as well. urlLink

urlLink Karla and my mama cooking....they were spectacular cooks........que rico!! urlLink
urlLink This is a mural representing the Spanish Invasion........I dont really know exactly what it says though....... urlLink
